name: Sages Are Stronger Together
description: Ok, so the game is pretty straight forward, there's not much of a story, so I will just put some controls here. For player 1, use A and D to move , W to jump/double jump, and S to shoot. For player 2, arrow keys to move, up arrow to jump, and down arrow to shoot. Thanks for playing, and please check out my YouTube channel!    YouTube
